name: A small leather arm wrapping called "Ember"
data: It increases the users strength magnificently.
It increases the users dexterity adequately.
It decreases the users constitution poorly.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'parry'.
